nodes.text:
The Galactic Circus existed during the period of the Great Sith War.
It toured many planets including Tatooine and included among its members, the Slith Sssiii. He was known to entertain patrons by playing chess.

The Galactic Circus appears as an organization in the roleplaying adventure Le facteur X, published in Casus Belli. This is a French gaming magazine and it is unknown whether the article went through the licensing process; therefore Sssiii's canonicity is ambiguous.
